dm:bugtracker.dm:product: SAP Data Hub 2 on SUSE CaaS Platform 3: Installation Guide

personname.surname: Le Dorze, ISV Solution Architect, SUSE

abstract.para: SAP Data Hub 2 is a toolset to govern big amounts of data. SUSE CaaS Platform 3 is the Kubernetes base that makes deploying SAP Data Hub 2 easy. This document describes the installation and configuration of SUSE CaaS Platform 3 and SAP Data Hub 2.

Disclaimer: This document is part of the SUSE Best Practices series. All documents published in this series were contributed voluntarily by SUSE employees and by third parties.
